title: Ākupo Pōōri po Koroona

summary: Kitapuuni kutinye kayoomiseetaap kamanuut weli kimuuche kēēpoorye pōōri pō koroona virus (COVID 19)”.

7.enb-x-Sengwer: Translated by Amos Kiprop, Amos Kiprop; Irine Kosgei; Emily Korir

10.enb-x-Sengwer: Mii kiy AKENGE nyi keemakyining ikuuye ākupo weli kimuuche kiinaamta keey pōōri po koroona
10.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

11.enb-x-Sengwer: Mii kiy AKENGE nyi keemakyining ikuuye ākupo weli kimuuche kiinaamta keey pōōri po koroona
11.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

26.enb-x-Sengwer: Pōōri po koroona kunāme chii ake  ikasokorta ng’ula

27.enb-x-Sengwer: Pōōri po koroona kunāme chii ake  ikasokorta ng’ula

28.enb-x-Sengwer: Itapaan keey. Kelyek ā-eeny si kukārteeng mu ng’uleek chi nyikiisēēn.
28.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

29.enb-x-Sengwer: Itapaan keey. Kelyek ā-eeny si kukārteeng mu ng’uleek chi nyikiisēēn.
29.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m to 0.5m will keep you safe from large droplets.

36.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku anyuun yi keeroo chii kulōōlē/kuuryoonye/imnyoone,iilēwēn iiyay ng’aleechu:
36.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

37.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku anyuun yi keeroo chii kulōōlē/kuuryoonye/imnyoone,iilēwēn iiyay ng’aleechu:
37.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

38.enb-x-Sengwer: Ikoochi icheekat kiy nyi kikārtooyee kuutit nda ku seruunek. Imuuche kuloolchi nda kuryoongyi kiyoonet āk ku karta chii ake tokol nyi lēēkite
38.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

39.enb-x-Sengwer: Ikoochi icheekat kiy nyi kikārtooyee kuutit nda ku seruunek. Imuuche kuloolchi nda kuryoongyi kiyoonet āk ku karta chii ake tokol nyi lēēkite
39.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

46.enb-x-Sengwer: Imukākse kukartakeey kityo mpo ndu mamnyāāne.
46.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

47.enb-x-Sengwer: Imukākse kukartakeey kityo mpo ndu mamnyāāne.
47.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

48.enb-x-Sengwer: Imuuch kuumnyoone chiito kumeepoorkeey  tukuuk chi ipooru pōōrito āku inoomtooy piich alak.
48.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

49.enb-x-Sengwer: Imuuch kuumnyoone chiito kumeepoorkeey  tukuuk chi ipooru pōōrito āku inoomtooy piich alak.
49.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

50.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku miisin, kiy nyi nyoolu ku-istokeey   weli mii kaayumetaap piich, āmu meemuche inaay chii nyi  mnyoone.
50.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

51.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku miisin, kiy nyi nyoolu ku-istokeey   weli mii kaayumetaap piich, āmu meemuche inaay chii nyi  mnyoone.
51.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

60.enb-x-Sengwer: Kartasiis chi kipoysye kipuuke ēwuun nda mu kaapchoo

61.enb-x-Sengwer: Kartasiis chi kipoysye kipuuke ēwuun nda mu kaapchoo

66.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

78.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku anyuun, kasarta ake imuuche kunam ng’ulekaap chii nyi imnyoone tukun alak…
78.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

79.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku anyuun, kasarta ake imuuche kunam ng’ulekaap chii nyi imnyoone tukun alak…
79.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

86.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku yi keenam  tukuuchuto ku meenay āk inaam mataanyng’uung,
86.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

87.enb-x-Sengwer: Āku yi keenam  tukuuchuto ku meenay āk inaam mataanyng’uung,
87.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

88.enb-x-Sengwer: Āk weli kiimuche kiiwaany ku kakiiwuun tukuuchooto mu sapuuni, nda ku sapuunisyek alak chi iwoonye simto.
88.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

89.enb-x-Sengwer: Āk weli kiimuche kiiwaany ku kakiiwuun tukuuchooto mu sapuuni, nda ku sapuunisyek alak chi iwoonye simto.
89.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

90.enb-x-Sengwer: Imuuch kutepi pōōrito  tukuun alak mu saa-isyek chi ng’eri,
90.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

91.enb-x-Sengwer: Imuuch kutepi pōōrito  tukuun alak mu saa-isyek chi ng’eri,
91.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

96.enb-x-Sengwer: Nyooto anyuun si ku po kaamanuut keeruup ng’aleechu
96.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

97.enb-x-Sengwer: Nyooto anyuun si ku po kaamanuut keeruup ng’aleechu
97.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

98.en: wash with soap up to here

99.en: wash with soap up to here

104.enb-x-Sengwer: Meenam matanyng’uung. (Nda ku nyipo chii ake.) Yoo imache inam matanyt, taay iwuun ēwuunekuuk kukaraam mu sapuuni.
104.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

105.enb-x-Sengwer: Meenam matanyng’uung. (Nda ku nyipo chii ake.) Yoo imache inam matanyt, taay iwuun ēwuunekuuk kukaraam mu sapuuni.
105.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

106.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

107.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

114.en: wash the back of your hands

115.en: wash the back of your hands

118.enb-x-Sengwer: Yi keenam ku mee-imkeey. iwuun ēwuunekuuk kityo mu sapuuni.
118.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

119.enb-x-Sengwer: Yi keenam ku mee-imkeey. iwuun ēwuunekuuk kityo mu sapuuni.
119.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

120.enb-x-Sengwer: Kukeny, meenam saangtaap kiyoonet ikartooye kutiit āk seruut.
120.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

121.enb-x-Sengwer: Kukeny, meenam saangtaap kiyoonet ikartooye kutiit āk seruut.
121.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

124.enb-x-Sengwer: Imuuche kutasak tukuun chi koonu pōōrwo chi ter ter mu weli po orit ikeelaach mu kasarta nyi kōōy
124.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

125.enb-x-Sengwer: Imuuche kutasak tukuun chi koonu pōōrwo chi ter ter mu weli po orit ikeelaach mu kasarta nyi kōōy
125.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

126.enb-x-Sengwer: Wirtee kiy nyi keekartooye kutiit āk seruut yi kaakunyaliliit. Meelaach kusiir pētuut akenge!
126.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

127.enb-x-Sengwer: Wirtee kiy nyi keekartooye kutiit āk seruut yi kaakunyaliliit. Meelaach kusiir pētuut akenge!
127.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

138.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

139.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

140.enb-x-Sengwer: Meemuukakse inam matanyikuuk mu kipkongiing’uung mpo ngutu iityem.
140.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

141.enb-x-Sengwer: Meemuukakse inam matanyikuuk mu kipkongiing’uung mpo ngutu iityem.
141.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

142.enb-x-Sengwer: Yaat āk kiikar kurket mu kipkongi nda ku kitikyeng’uung kusir ēwuun, yi imuukākse.
142.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

143.enb-x-Sengwer: Yaat āk kiikar kurket mu kipkongi nda ku kitikyeng’uung kusir ēwuun, yi imuukākse.
143.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
